title: Blended Research-Based Competency Enhancement Program for Learning Design Professional Development

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary instructional design theory and practical experience
context.additional_context: A case-based training program for practical application in language education, utilizing blended learning environments with digital devices

learning_goals: Learners can systematically derive instructional design requirements using literature analysis and mixed research methodologies (surveys, interviews, etc.)
Learners can compare international instructional design cases to present the current status and development directions of UK instructional design expertise development
Learners can develop customized learning design plans for language education using digital tools in self-directed learning environments
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
